actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain orphanages will not be treated as private foundations.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to treat certain orphanages as public charities rather than as private foundations for purposes of the income tax deduction for charitable contributions (contributions to public charities may be deducted up to 50 percent of the taxpayer's adjusted gross income).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain orphanages will not be treated as private foundations.
